structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY-COUNTY METROPOLITAN SEWER, SEWER CONSTRUCTION, AND SANITATION DISTRICTS

law.text: The commissioners shall give bond in such amount as the county judge/executive may require. The treasurer shall give bond in such amount as the commission may require.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 70, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 69, sec. 18, effective June 19, 1952.
